HEADER: Have you ever worked for the Criminal Justice System?
HEADER_OB: Has the person you're answering for ever worked for the Criminal Justice System?
QUESTION: Now or in the last 5 years, have you worked for the Police Force, HM Prison Service, the National Crime Agency or any prosecuting authority?
QUESTION_OB: Now or in the last 5 years, has the person worked for the Police Force, HM Prison Service, the National Crime Agency or any prosecuting authority?
SELECT_PROMPT: Please choose any organisations you have worked for
SELECT_PROMPT_OB: Please choose any organisations the person you're replying for has worked for
MORE_INFO_LINK: Why do we ask for this?
MORE_INFO_1: Your job in the Criminal Justice System doesn't stop you doing jury service. But we may get in touch to find out more.
MORE_INFO_1_OB: Working in the Criminal Justice system doesn't stop a person doing jury service. But we may get in touch to find out more.
